channel.title: Need help with changing the server ip of my client
channel.description: hey, ALL help will be appreciated thanks, but im having trouble trying to find where to change the server of my 317 DELTA CLIENT. i tryed gui.java, there isnt even an ip in there but there is 1 word, "LOCALHOST" im new to 317's so any help will be appreciated, i also tryed app_sub_1 or whatever it is.

item.title: Need help with changing the server ip of my client
item.dc:creator: @Project-Runescape Project-Runescape
item.description:
@Project-Runescape wrote:

Go to GUI or EGUI Click Edit And Search Ip: It will either say the officail client ip or this [Localhost] you cahnge it to your
ip then you can get people on and use it.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with changing the server ip of my client
item.dc:creator: @Mark123Scape Mark123Scape
item.description:
@Mark123Scape wrote:

i did dude, do you got teamviewer u can even try D: all thats there by "serverip: is “LOCALHOST”[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 04, 2009, 02:54:04 pm[/size][hr]System.out.println(“connecting to MarkScape”);
Serverip = “localhost”;
sign.signlink.startpriv(InetAddress.getByName(Serverip));

thats what i see

go into EGUI or GUI and you should see an 3 ips there, change them to the ip which you desire, save and compile.
